samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how the flat Scheduler looks like with its default set of minimal configurations.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the way of binding an array of JavaScript objects (local JSON datasource).

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the way of binding remote services by using the DataManager.

samples.name: Normal Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the usage of different types of events such as normal, spanned and all-day.

samples.name: Recurring Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the scheduler with recurring meetings handled on a regular pattern.

samples.name: Timezone
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how the events are displayed in different timings as per the selected timezone.

samples.name: Basic Views
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the usage of basic views such as Day, Week, Work Week and Month.

samples.name: Timeline Views
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how the timeline scheduler looks like with its default set of configurations.

samples.name: Agenda View
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the agenda view and the configurations available in it.

samples.name: Month Agenda View
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the layout of Month Agenda view and how it works.

samples.name: Individual View Settings
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to customize each of the view with specific configurations.

samples.name: View Intervals
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to display n number of days, weeks and months on a single view.

samples.name: Room Scheduler
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to design the room scheduling calendar and manage the events booked on a particular time interval.

samples.name: Fare Calendar
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to customize the scheduler to showcase it as an Airfare calendar.

samples.name: Shared Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the usage of single event that are shared by multiple resources.

samples.name: Different Work Days
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to set different working days for each of the resources.

samples.name: Show/Hide Resources
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to dynamically add or remove the resources to and from the scheduler layout.

samples.name: Horizontal Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how the calendars of multiple resources are grouped in default view layouts.

samples.name: Timeline Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how the calendars of multiple resources are grouped in timeline view layouts.

samples.name: Date-wise Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how the resources are grouped under each date.

samples.name: Hierarchical Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to group the child level resources against each of the parent level resources.

samples.name: Cell
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to customize the background of the specific cells using cell template option.

samples.name: Date Header
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to customize the date header cells using the template option.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to customize the appearance of events using event template option.

samples.name: Tooltip
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to display tooltip over events as well as the way to customize it using template option.

samples.name: Field Validation
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the way of adding default and custom validation rules to the editor fields of scheduler.

samples.name: Additional Fields
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to add additional fields to the default editor window.

samples.name: Editor Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the way of customizing the default editor window with custom template design.

samples.name: Header Rows
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to display the additional header rows on timeline view.

samples.name: Timescale
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to customize the grid lines of scheduler with different duration and count

samples.name: Header Bar
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the way of adding custom items onto the scheduler header bar.

samples.name: Scroll Time
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the way of manually scrolling to specific time on scheduler.

samples.name: Work Days
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control showcases how to set customized working days as well as first day of a week on scheduler.

samples.name: Hide Weekend
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control depicts the way to show or hide the weekend days of a week.

samples.name: Work Hours
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control showcases how to set the work hour range on scheduler.

samples.name: Day Hour Limit
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control depicts how to restrict the start and end hours on scheduler.

samples.name: Cell Dimension
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to set the width and height of the cells by overriding the default CSS classes.

samples.name: Read-only Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to make specific events on the scheduler to be displayed in a read-only mode.

samples.name: Rule Generator
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control showcases the recurrence rule generation based on the options selected from the recurrence editor.

samples.name: Populate Rule
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows how to fill the recurrence editor fields with values based on the provided recurrence rule string.

samples.name: Keyboard Interaction
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control showcases the keyboard shortcuts available on scheduler.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 Schedule control shows the client-side events that triggers on respective scheduler actions.
